title: Dragonhide armour

properties.name: description
properties.value: Dragonhide armour is worn by rangers and is made from the hide of dragons through the Crafting skill. content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Dragonhide armour

Dragonhide armour is worn by rangers and is made from the hide of dragons through the Crafting skill. Dragonhide armour comes in different colours depending on the hide it was made from, with different colours offering different bonuses. Each colour of dragonhide armour has vambraces, a body, and chaps. The colours of dragonhide are:

  • Green d'hide armour
  • Blue d'hide armour
  • Red d'hide armour
  • Black d'hide armour

They provide good defence bonus for melee, magic, and ranging. Ranged attack bonuses also are good, however, magic attack bonus is negative.

Although the different types of dragonhide armour vary in defensive and offensive stats, they all give the same deduction to offensive magic.

Although Dragon Slayer I quest completion is required to equip a green d'hide body, it is NOT required to equip a blue, red or black d'hide bodies.

This article is a stub.
A stub is an article which does not cover all information available about the topic. You can help by expanding it.
rawContent:
{{External|rs}}
'''Dragonhide armour''' is worn by [[Combat classes#Ranger|rangers]] and is made from the hide of dragons through the [[Crafting]] skill. Dragonhide armour comes in different colours depending on the hide it was made from, with different colours offering different bonuses. Each colour of dragonhide armour has vambraces, a body, and chaps. The colours of dragonhide are:

*[[Green d'hide armour]]
*[[Blue d'hide armour]]
*[[Red d'hide armour]]
*[[Black d'hide armour]]

They provide good [[defence bonus]] for [[melee]], [[magic]], and [[ranging]]. Ranged attack bonuses also are good, however, magic attack bonus is negative.

Although the different types of dragonhide armour vary in defensive and offensive stats, they all give the same deduction to offensive magic.

Although [[Dragon Slayer I]] quest completion is required to equip a [[green d'hide body]], it is '''NOT''' required to equip a [[Blue d'hide body|blue]], [[Red d'hide body|red]] or [[Black d'hide body|black d'hide bodies]].
[[Category:Ranged armour]]
{{stub}}
